body: Hello Everyone!.. I was just wondering how many users have left Avicus and who has left Avicus lately... Can anyone please give like a list, (that's sad, it shouldn't be a list).
body_tagged: Hello Everyone!.. I was just wondering how many users have left Avicus and who has left Avicus lately... Can anyone please give like a list, (that's sad, it shouldn't be a list).
title: Can Somebody Help Me?

replies.body: There isn't a list anywhere. Just try to keep up. :)
replies.body_tagged: There isn't a list anywhere. Just try to keep up. :)

replies.body: I know but there are so many people that have left and I am not always on... :(
replies.body_tagged: I know but there are so many people that have left and I am not always on... :(

replies.body:
You just can check their profile with this link: http://avicus.net/user/ and put his name on the link after user/

If the player wasn't online since a few months, he may left.
And don't forget to check his infractions, to see if he is banned or if he left.
replies.body_tagged:
You just can check their profile with this link: http://avicus.net/user/ and put his name on the link after user/
